<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ongoing Strategy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5959) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 110 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
strategic strike

</column>

---

You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time. On any Strike for which you didn't [Devise a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=2813), you still deal precision damage equal to your number of strategic strike damage dice so long as the weapon or [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) attack you used is one that would have let you use your Intelligence modifier had you Devised a Stratagem.
name: Ongoing Strategy
